title: Apache Maven
descirption: A default package manager used for the Java programming language and the Java runtime environment.

title: NuGet
descirption: A free and open source package manager used for the Microsoft development platforms including .NET.

title: RubyGems
descirption: A standard format for distributing Ruby programs and libraries used for the Ruby programming language.

title: npm
descirption: A package manager for JavaScript, included with Node.js. npm makes it easy for developers to share and reuse code.

title: Containers
descirption: A single place for your team to manage Docker images and decide who can see and access your images.
